name: Atlantida
tagline: We accompany you in the digital transformation...
description:
Atlántida was born in 1993, evolving exponentially both in the personnel incorporated to the company, and in the coverage of services that we offer our clients.
We consolidated year after year our growth in clients and projects obtaining important awards, awards and establishing a policy of alliances with important companies in the sector.
Atlantida's value proposition is based on our work methodology: consulting, analysis, design, application development, corporate solutions within the internet and new technologies' space.​
